resources.string: Enter a name for the roll

Version 1.0

All rights reserved. Not liable for any damage incurred from use of this software including but not limited to: monetary loss, temporary paralysis, halitosis, spontaneous combustion, road rash, and or premature hair loss.

Add new rolls by pressing the + -icon, delete rolls by pressing the trash can icon. You can view the frames of a roll by pressing on the roll you wish to view. You can rename a roll by pressing and holding the roll you wish to rename.

Add new frames by pressing the + -icon, delete frames by pressing the trash can icon. You can edit a frame\'s information by pressing on it. You can share the roll information by pressing the share icon. The app shares a text formatted in semi-colon separated values. You can save this in Dropbox for example and name the file with .csv ending.
